GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiContentControlList class.

GetAllItems.name: GetAllItems
GetAllItems.description: Returns a collection of items (the ApiContentControlListEntry objects) of the combo box / dropdown list content control.

GetElementsCount.name: GetElementsCount
GetElementsCount.description: Returns a number of items of the combo box / dropdown list content control.

GetParent.name: GetParent
GetParent.description: Returns a parent of the combo box / dropdown list content control.

Add.name: Add
Add.description: Adds a new value to the combo box / dropdown list content control.

params.name: sText
params.description: The display text for the list item.

params.name: nIndex
params.description: A position where a new value will be added.

Clear.name: Clear
Clear.description: Clears a list of values of the combo box / dropdown list content control.

GetItem.name: GetItem
GetItem.description: Returns an item of the combo box / dropdown list content control by the position specified in the request.

comment:
/**
	 * Class representing a list of values of the combo box / dropdown list content control.
	 * @constructor
	 */
description: Class representing a list of values of the combo box / dropdown list content control.
